short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Crack open the internet with Tab Soda.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
You open a new tab 25+ times a day—often without a second thought. Tab Soda transforms each one into a quick burst of curated news and stories, inspired by the nostalgic feel of Yahoo’s classic homepage.

Why Tab Soda?

Untapped Space: No competition on the new tab—your perfect spot for quality content.
Curated Content: Handpicked news and stories tailored to your interests.
Vintage Design: Retro-inspired interface that brings back the charm of the early web.
Quick & Easy: Engage with meaningful content in seconds—no endless scrolling.

Tab Soda integrates effortlessly into your daily routine, making every new tab an opportunity to stay informed and inspired without disrupting your workflow.

*Uses user location permission to provide local weather via IPapi*

*News stories are powered by Reddit's API*
